title: Get a Class Roster
description: A professor needs a printable roster for their class to take attendance on the first day.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and the specific course section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the professor and course.

tasks.description: Guide the faculty member to the faculty portal where they can view and print their class rosters.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for self-service.

tasks.description: Explain how to generate a version of the roster that includes student photos, if available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides additional helpful information about the system's features.
